author: Carl Graser
comment: Would be Better if at the top section would be smaller so that 2015 would fit with the date. Also if there was an AM and pm with the time then this would be 5 stars. Would also be cool if it would automatically change different  colors. Also if it display weather info

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Thank you. You can change colors in Android Wear app - tap on TTMMSTYLUS icon twice.

author: Dexter Groenink
comment: Colour is the only option that we can change. It would be nice to be able to change various things about the time/date format. For example displaying the month as "Aug" instead of "08".
title: Looks good but needs more options.

author: Gideon Guillen
comment: Great watch face for my Android Wear. *Update:* woo-hoo. Thanks for the update for transferring the time to the middle. Won't be bothered anymore that card previews are blocking the time.

author: Luke O'Laughlin
comment: Nice watch face but can't get into the setup on a Sony sw3 to change colors though, would make it a 5 if I could

reply.author: TIMESAPP
reply.content: Hi, thanks. On Android Wear app - tap the icon twice and setup should be open. If you will have other problems write to me directly.

comment: Would like to see the watch time alone have the ability to change to different color and I would 5 star it.
title: Ok.

author: LaJuan Hughes
comment: Easy to use and nice looking.
title: Great app
